prompt: 신선한 제철 재료로 만든 정성 가득한 한 끼. 입안 가득 퍼지는 진심을 오늘 저녁 식탁에서 느껴보세요.
svg:
<svg viewBox="0 0 1920 1080" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="radial_gradient_bg" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFEBDA"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FFF8F0"/>
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="shadow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feDropShadow dx="0" dy="10" stdDeviation="15" flood-color="#000000" flood-opacity="0.1"/>
    </filter>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect id="bg_rect" x="0" y="0" width="1920" height="1080" fill="url(#radial_gradient_bg)"/>

  <!-- Main stylized dish/bowl icon -->
  <path id="plate_shape" d="M960 380C800 380 680 500 680 660C680 820 800 940 960 940C1120 940 1240 820 1240 660C1240 500 1120 380 960 380ZM960 430C1080 430 1180 520 1180 660C1180 800 1080 890 960 890C840 890 740 800 740 660C740 520 840 430 960 430Z" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#FFDAB9" stroke-width="8" filter="url(#shadow)"/>
  <circle id="dish_inner_fill" cx="960" cy="660" r="160" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
  <path id="steam_deco_1" d="M900 320 Q920 280 960 290 T1020 270" stroke="#FFDAB9" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" opacity="0.6"/>
  <path id="steam_deco_2" d="M940 340 Q950 300 990 310 T1040 290" stroke="#FFDAB9" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" opacity="0.6"/>

  <!-- Decorative elements - leaves -->
  <path id="leaf_deco_1" d="M600 500 C500 450 450 550 550 650 L650 600 Z" fill="#9CCC65" transform="rotate(-15 600 500)"/>
  <path id="leaf_deco_2" d="M1320 600 C1420 650 1470 550 1370 450 L1270 500 Z" fill="#9CCC65" transform="rotate(15 1320 600)"/>
  <path id="leaf_deco_3" d="M780 850 C700 890 750 970 850 950 L800 880 Z" fill="#9CCC65" opacity="0.7"/>

  <!-- Text elements -->
  <text id="text_line_1_1" x="200" y="200" font-family="Noto Sans CJK KR, sans-serif" font-size="60" font-weight="bold" fill="#3E2723">신선한 제철 재료로</text>
  <text id="text_line_1_2" x="200" y="270" font-family="Noto Sans CJK KR, sans-serif" font-size="60" font-weight="bold" fill="#3E2723">만든 정성 가득한</text>
  <text id="text_line_1_3" x="200" y="340" font-family="Noto Sans CJK KR, sans-serif" font-size="60" font-weight="bold" fill="#C62828">한 끼.</text>

  <text id="text_line_2_1" x="1100" y="800" font-family="Noto Sans CJK KR, sans-serif" font-size="60" font-weight="normal" fill="#5D4037" text-anchor="end">입안 가득 퍼지는</text>
  <text id="text_line_2_2" x="1100" y="870" font-family="Noto Sans CJK KR, sans-serif" font-size="60" font-weight="normal" fill="#5D4037" text-anchor="end">진심을 오늘 저녁</text>
  <text id="text_line_2_3" x="1100" y="940" font-family="Noto Sans CJK KR, sans-serif" font-size="60" font-weight="normal" fill="#C62828" text-anchor="end">식탁에서 느껴보세요.</text>

  <!-- Placeholder for a logo or main title -->
  <text id="logo_placeholder_text" x="960" y="100" font-family="Noto Sans CJK KR, sans-serif" font-size="80" font-weight="bold" fill="#D32F2F" text-anchor="middle">오늘의 식탁</text>
</svg>
